ch.linetic.analysis

Class Analyzer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.linetic.analysis.Analyzer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AnalyzerInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClapAnalyzer, HandShakinessAnalyzer, HandsProximityAnalyzer, MultiplicityAnalyzer, OrientationAnalyzer, ShakinessAnalyzer, SpeedAnalyzer

    public abstract class Analyzer
extends java.lang.Object
implements AnalyzerInterface
    Abstract implementation of the AnalyzerInterface As all the analyzers has a lot in common, the abstract class is a helper class that all concrete analyzer should extends from. It defines useful function to rescale and adjust the result of the analyzers. As this class redefines the function analyze() the behavior of each Analyzer belongs to the compute() method.
    Author:
    ketsio
